commits.message: [Staking Async] Cancel slashes by validator and max slash fraction (#9187)
Fix definition of held balance (#9347)
Ensure withdrawals don’t bypass slashing (#9079)
[Staking Async] Saturating accrue era reward points (#9186)
Optimize buffered offence storage and prevent unbounded growth in staking-async ah-client pallet (#9049)
[Staking] [AHM] Fixes insufficient slashing of nominators (and some other small issues). (#8937)
[Staking] Cleanups and some improvements (#8701)
[StakingAsync] Remove SlashingSpan Logic (#8316)
Fix faulty pre-upgrade migration check in pallet-session (#8294)
[AHM] Async Staking module across AH and RC (#8127)
Remove the redundant FRAME coders substrate rule (#8100)
[AHM] Replace Validator FullIdentification from `Exposure` to `Existence` (#7936)
[Staking] Extrinsic `migrate_currency` handles any scenario where an old staking lock exists (#7933)
[AHM] Revert v17 migration of pallet-staking in Westend (#8059)
[AHM] Revert multi-block election, slashing and staking client pallets (#7939)
[staking] Currency Migration and Overstake fix (#7763)
[Nomination Pool] Make staking restrictions configurable (#7685)
[AHM] Moves disabling logic into pallet-session (#7581)
[Staking] Bounded Slashing: Paginated Offence Processing & Slash Application (#7424)
[Staking] Currency <> Fungible migration (#5501)
[Fix|NominationPools] Only allow apply slash to be executed if the slash amount is atleast ED (#6540)
[pallet-staking] Add page info to `PayoutStarted` event (#5984)
[Pools] New runtime api that returns the pot accounts associated with the pool (#6357)
[pallet-staking] Additional check for virtual stakers (#5985)
[Staking] Noop refactor to prep pallet for currency fungible migration (#5399)
[Staking] Propagate actual system error while staking::bond (#5627)
[Pools] fix derivation of pool account (#4999)
[Pools] Fix issues with member migration to `DelegateStake` (#4822)
[Pools] Ensure members can always exit the pool gracefully (#4998)
[NPoS] Some simple refactors to Delegate Staking (#4981)
[Staking] Delegators can stake but stakers can't delegate (#4904)
Impl and use default config for pallet-staking in tests (#4797)
[Pools] Refactors and runtime apis for DelegateStake (#4537)
Refactor Nomination Pool to support multiple staking strategies (#3905)
Allow pool to be destroyed with an extra (erroneous) consumer reference on the pool account (#4503)
Introduces: Delegated Staking Pallet (#3904)
[Staking] Not allow reap stash for virtual stakers (#4311)
[Staking] Runtime api if era rewards are pending to be claimed (#4301)
Allow privileged virtual bond in Staking pallet (#3889)
Nomination pool configurations can be managed by custom origin (#3959)
[NPoS] Remove better solution threshold for unsigned submissions (#2694)
[NPoS] Use EraInfo to manipulate exposure in fast-unstake tests (#2459)
[NPoS] Check if staker is exposed in paged exposure storage entries (#2369)
Speed up nominator state checks in staking pallet (#2153)
Speed up try runtime checks for pallet-bags-list (#2151)
[NPoS] Paging reward payouts in order to  scale rewardable nominators  (#1189)
[NPoS] Fix for Reward Deficit in the pool (#1255)
Take into account proof size for transaction payment and priority (#13958)
Have OCW mined election once a week on Westend (#7248)
divide payload into atleast one chunk (#14086)
Proxy for Nomination Pools (#6846)
add note on usage of twox hash (#13089)
Migrate Staking pallet to v13 (#6365)
Use #[pallet::storage_version] for pallet staking (#12728)
[Companion] Allow StakingAdmin to set min_commission (#6444)
Allow StakingAdmin to set `min_commission` (#13018)
Safe desired targets call (#12826)
[Companion] Bound Election and Staking by MaxActiveValidators (#6157)
Bound Election and Staking by MaxActiveValidators (#12436)
Execute try-state at end of each test to ensure pallet data integrity (#12453)
bounding staking: `BoundedElectionProvider` trait (#12362)
[fix] Bound staking ledger correctly with MaxUnlockingChunks from configuration (#12343)
re add the migration checks for staking (#12330)
[Companion] Get rid of HistoryDepth storage (#5996)
Bound staking storage items (#12230)

reviews.pr_title: Add boilerplate and overview for staking-async guide book
Cleanup staking try states + fix min bonds
delegated-staking: add and force missing delegator migration
[AHM/Staking/VMP] Paginated Offence Reports + Retries for Validator Set
staking-async: prevent manual application of cancelled slashes
staking-async: implement lazy era pruning extrinsic
[Staking] Use active era and not current era for bonding logic
[Staking AHM] Migrated fast-unstake, nomination-pools and delegated-staking from `staking` to `staking-async` for testing and benchmark
Implementation of RFC-0097: Unbonding Queue for pallet-staking-async
staking-async/papi-tests: fix justfile to run in CI
[Staking/AHM] Properly report weight of rc -> ah xcm back to the calls
[Staking Async] Cancel slashes by validator and max slash fraction
Add missing events to nomination pool extrinsics
Allow locking to bump consumer without limits
[AHM] Async Staking module across AH and RC
pallet-bags-list: Emit `ScoreUpdated` event only if it has changed
Optimize buffered offence storage and prevent unbounded growth in staking-async ah-client pallet
add try-state check for staking roles -- staker cannot be nominator a…
[AHM] The Asset Hub Migration on Westend
Add deposit for setting session keys
Fix calling nominate on a validator that doesn’t exist silently succeeds
EPMB: Handle empty solution pages gracefully in verifier
Whitelist for signed solution submitters in Staking
[AHM] Relax the requirement for RC-Client to receive +1 session reports
[AHM] Report the weights of epmb pallet to expose kusama and polkadot weights
Staking (EPMB): Add defensive error handling to voter snapshot creation and solution verification
Staking (EPMB): update the semantics of elect() and Phase::Extract(N)
Enable Merklized Distributions in Assets Pallet
fix epmb solution duplicate issue + add remote mining apparatus to epm
Reap pool member whose balance goes below ED
fix westend's election currency to vote conversion
[Fix|NominationPools] Only allow apply slash to be executed if the slash amount is atleast ED
[Pools] Fix issues with member migration to `DelegateStake`
[AHM] Adds multi-block election types and refactors current pallets to support new interfaces and types
Prepare Client Pallets for AHM Migration
[AHM] Revert multi-block election, slashing and staking client pallets
pallet-bounties: allow bounties to never expire
[AHM] Revert some AH-next staking changes from master
Glue in the staking clients pallets + improve
Implementation of ah-client and rc-client staking pallets
[Staking] Bounded Slashing: Paginated Offence Processing & Slash Application
Add storage bounds for pallet `staking` and clean up deprecated non paged exposure storages
[DNM] Implementation of `ah-client` and `rc-client` staking pallets (the old one)
Implements a mechanism to lock/unlock the SortedListProvider and bags-list iter (v2)
Adds `BlockNumberProvider` in multisig, proxy and nft pallets
[Deprecation] deprecate treasury `spend_local` call and related items
Bounty Pallet: add `approve_bounty_with_curator` call to `bounties` pallet
[Staking] Noop refactor to prep pallet for currency fungible migration
Asset Hub: auto incremented asset id for trust backed assets
Add new try-state check invariant for nomination-pools (points >= stake)
Patches `Call::Staking.restore_ledger` to ensure a restored ledger has enough free balance to cover staking locks
[MOVED] Remove staking controller account logic from pallets & runtimes
[Pools] Ensure members can always exit the pool gracefully
[Pools] Refactors and runtime apis for DelegateStake
Implements selective auto-update target score in the stake-tracker
fix build on MacOS: bump secp256k1 and secp256k1-sys to patched versions
add ref doc for logging practices in FRAME
[Staking] Runtime api if era rewards are pending to be claimed
Fix: dust unbonded for zero existential deposit

commits.message: Disable reserve_asset_transfer for DOT (#9544)
Pallet XCM - `transfer_assets` pre-ahm patch (#9137)
XCM precompile: small cleanup (#9135)
XCM precompile: don't support older xcm versions (#9126)
Nest errors in pallet-xcm (#7730)
ERC20 Asset Transactor (#7762)
XCM: Some weight fixes for `InitiateTransfer` (#7835)
Use non-native token to benchmark xcm on asset hub (#7893)
Remove execute_with_origin implementation in the XCM executor (#7889)
XCM: Process PayFees only once (#7641)
Update dispatchables doc link in pallet-revive's README (#7624)
Fix issue with InitiateTransfer and UnpaidExecution (#7423)
Add XCM benchmarks to collectives-westend (#6820)
Add aliasers to westend chains (#6814)
Add fallback_max_weight to snowbridge Transact (#6792)
XCM V5 - SetHints instruction (#6566)
Added fallback_max_weight to Transact for sending messages to V4 chains (#6643)
Fix `XcmPaymentApi::query_weight_to_asset_fee` version conversion (#6459)
XCMv5: add ExecuteWithOrigin instruction (#6304)
Assets in pool with native can be used in `query_weight_to_asset_fee` (#6080)
Add assets in pool with native to query_acceptable_payment_assets's return (#5599)
Remove redundant XCMs from dry run's forwarded xcms (#5913)
[xcm-emulator] Better logs for message execution and processing (#5712)
Clear other messages before dry-run to get only the ones produced during (#5581)
Swaps for XCM delivery fees (#5131)
Fix zombienet bridges test (#5373)
Migrate foreign assets v3::Location to v4::Location (#4129)
Add an adapter for configuring AssetExchanger (#5130)
Add `MAX_INSTRUCTIONS_TO_DECODE` to XCMv2 (#4978)
Implement `XcmPaymentApi` and `DryRunApi` on all system parachains (#4634)
Change `XcmDryRunApi::dry_run_extrinsic` to take a call instead (#4621)
Deprecate XCMv2 (#4131)
Mention new XCM docs in sdk docs (#4558)
XCM Cookbook (#2633)
XcmDryRunApi - Dry-running extrinsics to get their XCM effects (#3872)
Revert `execute_blob` and `send_blob` (#4266)
XCM builder pattern improvement - Accept `impl Into<T>` instead of just `T` (#3708)
pallet-xcm: Deprecate `execute` and `send` in favor of `execute_blob` and `send_blob` (#3749)
Add `claim_assets` extrinsic to `pallet-xcm` (#3403)
Add XCM documentation to the sdk docs (#2628)
Remove forgotten dbg! in a snowbridge test (#3322)
Add limits to XCMv4 (#3114)
Add unit impl for XcmAssetTransfers trait (#3022)
Add FungibleAdapter (#2684)
Add dummy impls of `fungible` and `fungibles` trait families (#2695)
Fix ParentOrSiblings (#2428)
Different XCM builders, default one requires fee payment (#2253)
Make PalletInfo fields public (#2231)
XCM builder pattern (#2107)
Remove some dbgs (#1949)
Enforce a decoding limit in MultiAssets (#1395)
Add environmental variable to track decoded instructions (#1320)
Add instruction limit when decoding XCMs (#1227)
Add tests for PayOverXcm (#7319)
Change Fixed to WeightInfoBounds for Polkadot (#7077)
XCM: PayOverXcm config (#6900)
XCM: Fix issue with RequestUnlock (#7278)
Stop weighing XCM execution on pallet-xcm's send extrinsic (#7201)
Make Pay trait from salaries pallet more generic (#13609)

reviews.pr_title: `pallet-xcm`: extract precompiles to a separate crate
update XcmPaymentApi query_delivery_fees to return the fee based on V…
Add XCM Precompile to Pallet Revive
xcm: Do not require `Asset` to be sorted on `decode`
[Draft][WIP] Set a memory limit when decoding an `UncheckedExtrinsic`
Fix subsume_assets incorrectly merging two AssetsInHolding
Fixed genesis config presets for bridge tests
Add expensive scenario for asset exchange
Add Missing Events for Balances Pallet
Allow configuration of worst case buy execution weight
[XCM Precompile] Rename functions and improve docs in the Solidity interface
Eth transaction do not double bump the nonce
CI: Enforce SemVer restrictions on backport PRs with optional override via `validate: false`
[Snowbridge]: Ensure source always from AH for exported message
Make `WeightBounds` return `Result<Weight, XcmError>` to surface XCM weight failures
Add Test to Validate Log Capture in XCM Dry Run Flow
Bump emulated-integration-tests-common to publish latest changes
Migrate pallet-examples-split to use umbrella crate
fix epmb solution duplicate issue + add remote mining apparatus to epm
fix: Resolve compile errors with new nested error structure
check XCM size in VMP routing
Remove TakeFirstAssetTrader from AH Westend and Rococo
Introduced a way to add configurable amount of both asset to the liquidity pool
Update transfer token gas and fee
Snowbridge - Fix penpal runtime and more tests transfer PNA
[XCM] allow signed account to be aliased between system chains
Use non-native token to benchmark xcm on asset hub
[XCM]XcmPaymentApi::query_delivery_fees() allow querying fee using custom asset
XCM: Deny barrier checks for nested XCMs with specific instructions to be executed on the local chain
xcm: avoid subtracting delivery fees twice
xcm: convert properly assets in xcmpayment apis
Derive `DecodeWithMemTracking` for cumulus pallets and for `polkadot-sdk` runtimes
Fix issue with InitiateTransfer and UnpaidExecution
transfer function Preservation is changed to Expendable
Use checked math in frame-balances named_reserve
Nits for collectives-westend XCM benchmarks setup
